annotation.Method: Picked the karar manually from the prominent pitch of the audio recording with 1 cent precision.
annotation.Citation: Salamon, J., & Gomez, E. (2012). Melody extraction from polyphonic music signals using pitch contour characteristics. IEEE Transactions on Audio, Speech, and Language Processing, 20(6), 1759-1770.

scoreInformed.Citation: Senturk, S., Gulati, S., & Serra, X. Score Informed Tonic Identification for Makam Music of Turkey. In Proceedings of ISMIR, 2013.
